short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReqBin HTTP Client to send HTTP API requests to the localhost and servers on your local network.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ReqBin Chrome extension allows developers to send HTTP API requests to localhost and servers on the local network from the browser.
